text: Apple is set to open its first store in downtown Detroit, enhancing its presence in Michigan.
President Trump announces that Apple plans to shift manufacturing from Mexico to the U.S. Details remain unclear.
Apple removes its advanced end-to-end encrypted security feature for cloud data in the UK after government demands for access.
Goldman Sachs raises Apple's stock price target to $294, reflecting confidence in the company's growth prospects.
Apple News+ subscribers will soon access 'News+ Food,' featuring thousands of recipes from top publishers. Launching in April with iOS 18.4.
Apple TV+ app is now available on Android devices, potentially opening a significant revenue stream.
Apple's new iMac with the M4 chip offers significant performance boosts, especially in AI capabilities and gaming. Available in seven colors.
Analysts predict a strong holiday season for Apple, with an estimated 240 million iPhones sold in fiscal 2025. A supercycle of growth is anticipated.
Apple faces a class-action lawsuit alleging illegal monopolization of the smartphone market.
Reports suggest Apple is in talks with OpenAI to integrate ChatGPT into iOS 19. A major shift in AI strategy.
Apple's rumored foldable iPhone might be delayed until 2026 due to production issues.
MacBook Pro with M3 Max outperforms high-end Windows laptops in recent benchmarks. Apple silicon continues to dominate.
Apple Pay Later officially launches in the U.S., allowing users to split purchases into four payments with no interest.
Reports indicate Apple is working on a subscription model for iPhones, allowing users to pay monthly for the latest models.
Apple's self-driving car project reportedly facing major setbacks. Timeline for launch pushed back again.
Developers criticize Apple for its tight control over the App Store and high commission fees. Calls for regulation grow louder.
Apple partners with TSMC to develop 2nm chips, promising even greater efficiency and performance for future devices.
Apple's AirPods Pro 3 might feature built-in health sensors for tracking temperature and heart rate.
Rumors suggest Apple is planning a major redesign for the iPad Pro with OLED displays in 2025.
iOS 18 beta reveals a new Live Translate feature for FaceTime, allowing real-time conversation translation.
Apple Music Classical now includes exclusive recordings from top orchestras worldwide.
Apple faces backlash after removing third-party game emulators from the App Store.
Apple Watch Ultra 3 rumored to have a microLED display for improved brightness and battery life.
Apple expands iPhone repair program to include more third-party repair shops.
iPadOS 18 could bring macOS-like multitasking features to iPads, further blurring the line between tablets and laptops.
Apple CEO Tim Cook says AI will be a major focus for the company's future product lineup.
Apple files a patent for an under-display Face ID system, removing the notch in future iPhones.
Apple is developing its own in-house 5G modem to reduce reliance on Qualcomm. Expected launch by 2026.
Apple Vision Pro pre-orders exceed expectations, signaling strong interest in spatial computing.
Apple reportedly exploring satellite-based emergency communication for iPhones.
Mac users frustrated as Apple phases out support for Intel-based Macs in the latest macOS update.
Apple Pay expands to more countries, increasing its global market share in digital payments.
Apple's Swift programming language continues to grow in popularity among developers.
Apple introduces AI-generated playlists in Apple Music, competing with Spotify's AI DJ.
Apple's latest MacBook Air models may feature a MagSafe-like charging port for added convenience.
Apple just dropped the iPhone 16e—$599 with AI features! Budget-friendly power incoming.
Tim Cook teases a manufacturing shift from Mexico to the US. Big move for Apple!
The iPhone 16e’s 26-hour battery life is wild. Outdoes even the iPhone 16!
Apple pulls Advanced Data Protection in the UK. Government pressure wins this round.
New MacBook Air with M4 chip dropping by March? Count me in!
Apple Intelligence hits Vision Pro in April. Spatial computing just got smarter.
iPhone 16e pre-orders start today! Who’s grabbing this AI-powered steal?
Apple News+ Food coming in April—recipes galore for subscribers!
Alibaba partnership could boost Apple’s AI game in China. Stock’s looking good!
No more small iPhones? iPhone 16e sticks to 6.1 inches. RIP tiny screens.
Apple’s first in-house 5G modem debuts with iPhone 16e. Future-proof vibes!
UK iCloud users lose end-to-end encryption. Apple caves to government demands.
iPhone 16e replaces the SE—more power, same wallet-friendly appeal.
Apple Vision Pro gets a big update in April with Apple Intelligence. Excited!
New HomePad rumors heat up—Apple’s smart home push is coming!
iPhone 16 prices drop as 16e launches. Time to upgrade?
Apple’s A18 chip in the iPhone 16e is a game-changer for the mid-range.
No (PRODUCT)RED for iPhone 16e? Apple’s charity color is fading out.
Apple teams up with Alibaba for AI in China. Smart move for iPhone sales!
iPad Air with M4 chip rumored for spring. Apple’s tablet lineup is heating up!
Apple’s iPhone 16e hits stores Feb 28. Who’s lining up?
Siri gets ChatGPT integration with iPhone 16e. AI just got personal!
Apple scraps encryption feature in Britain. Privacy takes a hit.
New iPhone 16e rocks a 48MP camera. Budget shooters rejoice!
Apple’s manufacturing pivot to the US could dodge China tariffs.
HomePod mini 2 on the horizon? Apple’s spring lineup looks stacked!
iPhone 16e’s Ceramic Shield is tough as nails. Durability win!
Apple News+ Food feed sounds delicious—coming with iOS 18.4!
Trump says Apple’s moving plants to the US. Big if true!
iPhone 16e brings Apple Intelligence to the masses. AI for all!
Apple’s Vision Pro app on iPhone is a game-changer for spatial fans.
New iPad with A17 Pro chip rumored. Apple’s not slowing down!
iPhone 16e’s USB-C upgrade is long overdue. Welcome to 2025!
Apple stock jumps 6% after Alibaba AI deal. Investors are hyped!
No backdoor in encryption, says Apple—except now in the UK.
iPhone 16e’s black and white colors keep it sleek and simple.
Apple’s first big 2025 launch is here with iPhone 16e. More to come!
Vision Pro reps tease a Friday announcement. What’s cooking?
iPhone 16e’s 2-in-1 camera system is a budget photography beast!
Apple’s smart home hub rumors swirl—HomePad could be epic!
iPhone 16e sales could boost Apple after a slow 2024 end.
Apple Intelligence on a budget? iPhone 16e nails it!
New Magic Keyboard for iPad Air? Apple’s spring refresh is lit!
iPhone 16e’s Face ID is a step up from the old SE. Modern vibes!
Apple’s AI push in China with Alibaba could shake up the market.
iOS 18.4 brings News+ Food—tens of thousands of recipes await!
Apple’s C1 modem in iPhone 16e is a 5G game-changer!
iPhone 16e proves Apple can do affordable without skimping.
Apple’s UK encryption rollback sparks privacy debates.
Five new Apple products rumored for spring—2025 is huge!
iPhone 16e’s launch has me hyped—AI and power for $599!
